channel.title: Runescape phish warning
channel.description:
Not sure if you guys recieved this too, but i got an email from "Jagex" saying i had broken a rule. I was 2 seconds away from loging into runescape with the adress it provided when i saw the nav bar said Runescaqe. Then i scanned the page and it was found as a phish site.
If you get an email from jagex saying an offence do NOT LOGIN WITH THE PROVIDED URL! It is a Password Scam. If you already did then i suggest changing your password.
I know its not real because when i checked my runescape actual account managment it said i had no new offences.
Ill post pictures and proof later.

item.title: Runescape phish warning
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

Fridder:

I saw something that said ‘your account has been banned for real world trading’ and I almost believed it… I went to click the link but it said ‘ruunescape.net’ or something around there… I always check to see if the page is https before entering any RuneScape shit on it.

I really doubt anybody’s ever fallen for these sites. Plus, I get emails from a site that is https that is still a phish.

Read full topic

@orcashark wrote:

Oh lmao. I know there often but i thought there was like a big one going around right now :o

item.title: Runescape phish warning
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:406787”]I get about 10 of these things daily.

People be wantin’ my account, yo’[/quote]
I also get at least 3 a day. My uncle actually fell for this a while back and lost 16M, but still refuses to believe it was because of that email.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape phish warning
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

No matter what site I get them from I always read the email and then access my account info myself, not through the link they give me.

Read full topic
